content.text: 1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (10 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained" )

content.text: 1 1/2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 1/2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@15:31 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium heat"@37:48 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in onion, and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "cook"@22:26 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until softened"@27:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "about 2 minutes"@43:58 / DUR )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "onion"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in beans and corn, then add sugar, salsa, and pepper flakes; mix well.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "beans"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "corn"@21:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "add"@32:35 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "sugar"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salsa"@43:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "pepper flakes"@54:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-2 "mix"@69:72 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cook until heated through, about 3 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until heated through"@8:28 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "about 3 minutes"@30:45 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Melt 2 teaspoons of the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "2 teaspoons of the butter"@8:33 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a large skillet"@37:52 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium heat"@58:69 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "a tortilla"@9:19 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "the skillet"@23:34 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "sprinkle"@36:44 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cheese"@57:63 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "top"@70:73 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "some of the bean mixture"@79:103 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place another tortilla on top, cook until golden, then flip and cook on the other side.
7) Repeat with remaining tortillas and filling.
